CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, page 12, reads: "Sisters Salute Graduates - Proud members of the kindergarten graduating class of St. Brigid's Roman Catholic Church, recently, included La San Owens and Bernadette Stanley, center, front. Their boosters, left to right, include: Sisters M. Cyril of the house of Mary; M. Rosalie of Radio and TV School; Marie Martin, who is a pharmacy student at Duquesne University; Rose Elizabeth, a teacher at St. Brigid's; Marie Annette, a nurse; and Marcella Mary of the house of Mary. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four nuns wearing dark habits and rosary beads, left to right: Sisters M. Rosalie, Marie Martin, Rose Elizabeth, and Marie Annette, and two young girls, wearing light colored dresses: La San Owens and Bernadette Stanley, standing in front of brick building with billboard in background, metal fence on right
